# R Markdown

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(CellBench)
library(purrr)

load_sc_data()

map <- purrr::map
partial <- purrr::partial

subset_data <- cellbench_sc_data %>%
    map(partial(keep_high_var_genes, n = 1000)) %>%
    map(partial(sample_cells, n = 50))

clustering_method <- list(
    sc3 = clustering_sc3,
    race_id = clustering_raceid
)

options("CellBench.threads" = 4)

res <- begin_benchmark(
    subset_data,
    clustering_method
)
```
